issue.title: outlook.live.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://outlook.live.com/mail/0/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Foutlook.live.com%2Fmail%2F0%2F) ### Comment Username: @t3chnob0y > Upgrade your Account Ad not blocked (see attached screenshots). The following rule removes the banner and grey background rectangle : > > outlook.live.com###MainModule > div.SW7A6 > div.LBktY > div.q9iRC.css-180:nth-child(3) > div.HOVUa > div.nbmyu.FkPdL.LCprM:last-child > div.C1EJK.css-183:first-child > div.Cz7T5.customScrollBar:nth-child(2) > div.ckaDq > div.fGEFC:first-child > div.ELQfE > div.full.jYY8g ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/9PbpmjX.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/V0u7xn9.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.39 Browser: | EdgeChromium Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Language-specific:
AdGuard French

comment.body: Hm, but I didn't add `outlook.live.com#@?#div[tabindex="-1"][role][data-app-section="MessageList"] > div.customScrollBar > div div.full:first-child:has(i[data-icon-name="Delete"] + div + button)` to usefulads filter.
